Posts.EditableText:
Hello,

While attempting to play my game (built on browser) I ran into an error reading "Server Error in '/' Application." It stated some stuff about local server machine, so I figured I should ask here for help before I try anything to fix it. Is this something I need to fix, or is this an error with the server? The version from the night before was working perfectly fine, and the only changes made were updating a room description. I cleared this out and ran it again and received the same error. 

Thanks!
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Having the same error, it's happened before. Pretty sure you just have to wait for it to be fixed, unfortunately! It's a server error, so it affects everyone until it's fixed.
Posts.HTML: Having the same error, it's happened before. Pretty sure you just have to wait for it to be fixed, unfortunately! It's a server error, so it affects everyone until it's fixed.

Posts.EditableText: Darn! Oh well, thanks for the info

Posts.EditableText: Can you check again? It looks okay to me; I could get into the Quest editor and start a Quest game.
